channel.title: Luigi on Memo Tut
channel.description: Recent content in Luigi on Memo Tut

item.title: [Python] Smoother pipeline processing in Luigi! Introducing gokart
item.description: # what is this? This is a summary article about gokart, a wrapper library for Luigi. The motivation for development and basic usage are summarized in M3’s blog very carefully, and the basic usage is It’s a story that I should read this, but I wanted to summarize it as a reverse lookup reference, so I made an article. The functions of Luigi itself are not explained so much.
